elements.title: the alleged son (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the alleged son (pictured) of an Ottoman sultan and an enslaved concubine became a Catholic friar?

elements.title: the healthcare needs of intersex people (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the healthcare needs of intersex people depend on what physical characteristics they have?

elements.title: Queen Isabella I (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Queen Isabella I lost her first husband to politics, her second to assassins, her third to a window, and her fourth to fish?

elements.title: Nueva Vizcaya Agricultural Terminal (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that a study in 2024 found that about half of the 500 tonnes (1.1 million lb) of produce brought to the Nueva Vizcaya Agricultural Terminal daily was thrown out?

elements.title: Thomas Schubert (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Thomas Schubert made his acting debut on the 2011 film Breathing, on the director's insistence that an amateur actor play the leading role?

elements.title: 2007 NFC Championship Game (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the 2007 NFC Championship Game, with a temperature of −3 °F (−19 °C) and wind chill as low as −24 °F (−31 °C), was one of the coldest games in Lambeau Field history?

elements.title: Frederic Willans (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Sir Frederic Willans attended the deathbeds of Queen Alexandra and her son King George V?

elements.title: 2013 drone strike on a wedding convoy (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that while the United States publicly denied any wrongdoing in a 2013 drone strike on a wedding convoy, it likely gave over $1 million in compensation to the victims' families?

elements.title: Alexander McIver (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Alexander McIver took his fight to remain North Carolina's superintendent of public instruction all the way to the state supreme court?

elements.title: Destination of the Month (Wikivoyage recommendations)
elements.contents:
Destination of the Month

Parahyangan

The West Javanese region centred around Java's third largest city of Bandung is an excellent place to hike and admire active volcanoes.

elements.title: Off the Beaten Path (Wikivoyage recommendations)
elements.contents:
Off the Beaten Path

Sekigahara

This quaint mountain town and battlefield, where Tokugawa won control of Japan, gives visitors firsthand insight into feudal Japanese warfare.

elements.title: Featured Travel Topic (Wikivoyage recommendations)
elements.contents:
Featured Travel Topic

Driving in China

China isn't one of the countries that foreigners commonly explore by driving themselves. If you'd still like to, the first step would be getting a local driving licence.
